definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences
financial year/fiscal year (e.g. from April to March, for tax purposes)

pinyin: nian2 du4 gu3 dong1 da4 hui4

sentences.english: GLO started the sponsorship of the Confederation of African Football African Player of the Year Award.
sentences.chinese: 格洛開始贊助的非洲足球聯合會非洲年度最佳球員。

sentences.english: Europe and Russia accounted for bulk of tobacco exports in the current year.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲和俄羅斯佔本年度菸草出口的大部分。

sentences.english: To examine and approve the annual plans of commemorative and special stamps;
sentences.chinese: 負責審定紀念郵票和特種郵票年度計劃。

sentences.english: The year before, 2, 295 square kilometers (1, 426 square miles) were destroyed over that time period.
sentences.chinese: 在上一個年度，有2295平方公里的森林被毀。

sentences.english: The 14th annual Webby Awards are to be announced in April 2010.
sentences.chinese: 第十四屆年度威比獎將在2010年4月公佈。

sentences.english: This year we will be inviting applications for 2006 scholarships.
sentences.chinese: 2006年度的志奮領獎學金項目開始接受申請。

sentences.english: The quota of immigrants for this year has already been filled.
sentences.chinese: 本年度的移民限額已滿。

sentences.english: Financial year-end date not coterminous with that of the Government.
sentences.chinese: 財政年度結算日期與政府的不同。

sentences.english: This year it expects to double its sales.
sentences.chinese: 它希望本年度這一數字能翻番。

sentences.english: The previous year's deficit was $459 billion.
This is the half-yearly meeting of the interim committee.
sentences.chinese: 這是臨時委員會的半年度會議。

sentences.english: Big anniversaries come and go, but moments like this arise only rarely.
sentences.chinese: 大型年度慶典來來往往，但像這樣的時刻很出現。

sentences.english: For his supreme skill in making the Games work, and work brilliantly, Ueberroth is TIME's Man of the Year.
sentences.chinese: 尤伯羅斯成爲了時代的年度人物。

sentences.english: Promotion and package should be planned as part of the hotel's annual marketing plan.
sentences.chinese: 酒店年度的市場銷售計劃中應包括促銷價的施行計劃。

sentences.english: We usually hold our annual fire drill during the summer.
sentences.chinese: 我們通常在夏天舉辦年度消防演習。

sentences.english: Country singer Taylor Swift is among the nominees for Best New Artist.
sentences.chinese: 鄉村歌手泰勒斯維夫提名爲最佳年度新人。

definition: notice or announcement/list of names/public roll of successful examinees
to select on the basis of a vote or consensus
to continue in a post/(to hold a post) several times in succession/(to win a title) in successive years/to stay at number one/to defend a championship
(of a list, music chart etc) to reach the top
